item.description: As the first in a series of preserving workshops, the Winter Cache Project will offer a workshop on making half-sour pickles on Monday, August 20th at 7pm at Unity Village (24 Stone Street, Portland). Bring mason jars, cucumbers or other vegetables, a small cash donation, or just yourself. All participants will take home the fruits of our labors. We request, but don't require, you to RSVP. If you are interested in this or other preserving workshops, email wintercache@riseup.net for more information or call Julia at 595-2353

group.name: Portland Maine Permaculture & The Resilience Hub

item.name: Canning Workshop with Winter Cache!
